pullrequest.title: Load GUI Plugins with gzclient parameter -g, fixes issue 1311

content.raw:
jenkins:

[homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/934/) - ok

[xenial-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/26/) - ok

update:

Test results look good. On OSX, apart from the two recurring gui test failures, I have not seen the `ExportDialog` test failure before but it looks unrelated / flaky.
